title: Fortune.st
author: Fortune.st
created_time: November 22, 2022, 09:09:12 AMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 11:15:28 AM by Fortune.st
content: Greetings everyone,This is a new business account belonging to https://fortune.st/ Crypto Casino company and I guess it is right to make our first post in this section introducing ourselves to the esteemed Bitcoin-talk audience. Work is in advance stage already and in less than a month from now we are going to be live as probably one of the most exciting Casino platform in this community. Kindly stay tuned.We are looking forward to working with some of the most credible senior members of this forum to achieve our desired marketing target. We want to get it right from day one. So, if your an experienced campaign manager, promoter or just a great guy who has been participating in campaigns, feel free to comment here and tell us how best we can work with you.Thank you,Fortune.st

comments.body: We've got too many list for campaign managers like this list:  LIST Campaign Management ServicesBut to give you a suggestion, I'd personally recommend to you Hhampuz as he's been the manager of my current campaign and he's very professional with the way he manages all of his campaigns.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on November 22, 2022, 09:09:12 AMGreetings everyone,This is a new business account belonging to a Crypto Casino company and I guess it is right to make our first post in this section introducing ourselves to the esteemed Bitcoin-talk audience. Work is in advance stage already and in less than a month from now we are going to be live as probably one of the most exciting Casino platform in this community. Kindly stay tuned.We are looking forward to working with some of the most credible senior members of this forum to achieve our desired marketing target. We want to get it right from day one. So, if your an experienced campaign manager, promoter or just a great guy who has been participating in campaigns, feel free to comment here and tell us how best we can work with you.Thank you,Fortune.stHello and welcome to Bitcointalk. I have been around awhile and from my experience in managing signature campaigns I would advise you not to consider launching 1 unless you plan on running it for a few months. Companies that launch any sort of "test" campaign that lasts a week or 2 are just wasting money. You will not get great traffic unless you consider long term promotions. Don't buy into any speech from a manager telling you different, they're just looking to get a paycheck. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1704638.0 Here is a list of some of the companies I have worked with. You'll notice lots of casino clients. I manage pretty much anything you can think of. Review campaigns, Signature campaigns, Twitter, Facebook, and even offer community manager services. Feel free to drop me a pm or contact me directly on telegram @yahoo62278. I'll be happy to answer any questions you may have.

comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on November 22, 2022, 01:57:13 PMFirst time seeing the TLD .st but the entire name "Fortunest" sounds nice.Did you match is with the TLD to get the full word or there are indeed a category of .st TLD?Not really a top-level domain but maybe just maybe OP just want the word "Fortunest" in the casino that they are going to set up, but whatever, its the platform and the goal that are what mattersQuote.st is the Internet country code top-level domain (ccTLD) for São Tomé and Príncipe. The code is marketed worldwide as an abbreviation for various entities.Quote from: len01 on November 22, 2022, 10:15:49 AMsome people who have a good reputation in project marketing :•Hhampuz•CryptopreneurBrainboss•Royse777•icopress•yahoo62278•sujonali1819•joeperryQuote from: Royse777 on November 22, 2022, 01:57:13 PMGood to see you have me in mind :-)I support len01 you deserve to be on the list, and we are not just two

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on November 22, 2022, 03:02:10 PMThank you guys for the warm welcome and the beautiful recommendations so far. I'm keeping record of your suggestions, including some that are not on this list. I will be contacting some in the coming weeks to discuss the project. I will keep following the topic for any suggestion and we progress.Yap, there are a quite few very good managers, you won't go wrong with any of them.when you have already negotiated a possible engagement, you should insist on getting a potential analysis and proposal on the type of campaign and the way it is run. also, consult the manager about your actual budget for promotion here, I think that a short-term signature campaign has almost no significant effect. especially in the gambling industry, where the competition is huge.
